alert.note: Alert for Suwannee; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 12:13PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist, Bradford, northwestern Alachua, southwestern Baker, Union, southern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 115 PM EST... At 1212 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Five Points to 12 miles south of Mayo. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Starke, Trenton, Lake Butler, Bell, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia and Alachua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
